about_the_game:
Legion of Die is a fast paced action-roguelite where you play as an intern for a government organization. You must fight your way to the top of a multi-floor casino and defeat the mafia boss in hopes of receiving a promotion into the coveted Legion f Die.

Think on Your Feet


Your weapon changes whenever you roll! Your roll is a powerful ability that allows you to dodge bullets and damage enemies, but doing so will cause you to swap to a new weapon out of the ones you have equipped requiring you to react to what the RNG gives you.

Unique Weapons and Abilities


Discover new weapons as well as dice which can be equipped as your body. Sacrifice these dies to gain abilities that can help you throughout your run. Combine mechanics to find exciting synergies.
